sentences.en: Also unlike auxin, cytokinins promote the growth of lateral buds , not shoot tips.
sentences.cn: 同样不同于生长激素, 细胞分裂素促进侧芽的生长, 而不是顶芽的生长.

sentences.en: Apical buds produce a growth hormone called auxin.
sentences.cn: 顶芽分泌出叫做生长素的生长类激素.

sentences.en: Auxin homeostasis, polar transport and signaling affect the whole progress of leaf development.
sentences.cn: 生长素的稳态调控 、 极性运输和信号转导影响叶片发育的全过程.

sentences.en: It has been reported that ARF gene expression was not effected by auxin concentration.
sentences.cn: 已有报道说ARF基因的表达都不受生长素浓度的影响.

sentences.en: Leaf fall The shedding of leaves , usually associated with a fall in AUXIN concentration.
sentences.cn: 落叶:即树叶的脱落, 常伴植物激素浓度的降低.

sentences.en: Scientists have found some clues, for example the effect of auxin in the process.
sentences.cn: 科学家已经发现了一些线索，例如植物的生长素在这个过程中起到的作用。

sentences.en: These bars buds themselves also produce auxin.
sentences.cn: 而这些叶芽本身也可以生成生长素.

sentences.en: These bats buds themselves also produce auxin.
sentences.cn: 这些花蕾本身也会产生茁长素.

sentences.en: These buds themselves also produce auxin.
sentences.cn: 这些芽本身还生产出生长素.

sentences.en: Whenever a plant responds to applied , i . e . , unbalanced, applications of auxin, ethylene is produced.
sentences.cn: 当一植物对不平衡地施用生长素起反应时, 总是产生乙烯.

trans.tran_cn: 植物生长素，植物激素，茁长素
trans.tran_en: any of various plant hormones, such as indoleacetic acid, that promote growth and control fruit and flower development
